.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx1030_sbase_020892:

sbase
=====

A 64-bit base address for scalar memory operations.

*Size:* 2 dwords.

*Operands:* :ref:`s<amdgpu_synid_s>`, :ref:`vcc<amdgpu_synid_vcc>`, :ref:`ttmp<amdgpu_synid_ttmp>`
